University of Dhaka.

This android application is created for our Application lab project in 2nd year 2nd semester.So we decide to make Railway Guide app. This app will provide the information of every lines train information like how many train runs in this route and when travels,what is the seat price of each type(AC,S-Chair).

 The user also can set alarm in this app which will remain the user his journey date.
 Me and my another two project partner made this. 


 Details:

First of all user need to create an user account by filling necessary data that are wanted. 

In Home navigation bar by Search Train user can find from a district to another districts total number train runs. And can also see each train information such as total number of seats, price of each type of seat in trains and if user want to travel this train in a specific date can set an alarm in this app. Trust me that this app is faithful and in time it will notify the user about his journey.

 However, by the locate train user can know where a train is located this time by adding the train number.

 This app will also keep the traveling history of the user. So in traveling history user can see his/her traveling history.

 And in train info user can search a train and can see the details of the train. 

 In the profile navigation bar user can see his/her profile and can edit and can add profile picture. also can see his/her travelling history from here.
 In setting user can change some internal function of this application. And user can also send feedback about this app and can share this app.
